participant_1.background:
I'd brag about my famous Harry Potter knowledge to my friends.
I was a teacher before I started my own clothing line.
I do my laundry every other day because I like to keep my clothes fresh and clean.
I have a big personality to match my beer gut.
i am married with 5 kids.

participant_2.background:
I have a unique way of enjoying my coffee, and I'm a dedicated worker who is still looking for the perfect partner.
I love how sci fi space adventures are able to take me to other worlds and explore new possibilities.
I'm not rich but I do have a lot of pictures and stories to share from my travels.
I lost a patient in my arms.
I don't care about social media as much as I do about my relationships with my friends and family.

content.text: I'm so glad to meet you!
Hi! I'm glad to meet you too!
I heard you're a dedicated worker. What do you do for a living?
I'm a nurse.
Oh, that's amazing! I have so much respect for nurses. What do you like most about your job?
I love helping people and making a difference in their lives. I also love the feeling of accomplishment when I'm able to help someone get better.
That's so great! I'm sure you're a great nurse.
Thanks! I try my best.
Do you have any hobbies?
I love to read and travel. I also enjoy watching sci fi movies and TV shows.
Sci fi is my favorite genre too! What's your favorite sci fi movie?
I love Star Wars and Star Trek.
Me too! Those are my favorites too.
What about you? Do you have any hobbies?
I love to read, play video games, and watch movies.
That's great! I love video games too. What's your favorite video game?
I love The Legend of Zelda and Mario games.
Me too! Those are my favorites too.
It's great to meet someone who shares my interests.
Me too
